definition: a person of subnormal intelligence, cause to move more slowly or operate at a slower rate
details:
noun
- a person of subnormal intelligence
= synonyms: imbecile
verb
- cause to move more slowly or operate at a slower rate
= example: cause to move more slowly or operate at a slower rate
- lose velocity
= synonyms: slow
- slow the growth or development of
= example: slow the growth or development of
= synonyms: check
- be delayed
